[ library(test_util) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

+Goal should_fail

Run the goal Goal and print a message if it doesn't fail

Examples

3.0 > 3 should_fail.

See Also

should_give / 2, should_throw / 2, should_raise / 2, should_fail / 2, should_give / 3, should_throw / 3, should_raise / 3
